body.name: Unisex Belt Bag, Pander 1L Everywhere Fanny Pack for Women with Adjustable Strap, Small Waist Pouch for Workout Running Traveling Hiking (Seal Grey, One Size).

features: ✅ DIMENSIONS - The everywhere belt bag appearance size: 7.5” X 2” X 5”(19cm X 5.5cm X 13cm); Adjustable strap: 32” to 51.25”(81cm ~ 130cm) —Includes the buckle and bum bag; Volume: 1L.

✅ DURABLE MATERIAL - PANDER everywhere mini belt bag are made of durable nylon fabric, which is water resistant, durable and anti-abrasion, ensure a long-lasting usage. The finest quality zipper would allow to get into the bag without worrying about dumping the contents.

✅ VERSATILE STYLE - Fanny pack for women adjustable strap easily and quickly adjusts to whatever length you need and will remain at your chosen length without loosening, allow you to wear this belt bag in a variety of ways. can be used as a cross-body bags, bum bag, chest bag and belt bags. It’s all up to you.

✅ ON THE MOVE - The everywhere fanny pack features a large and spacious zippered pocket with 3 mesh wall pockets inside. The innovative zipper opens creating an ultra-wide opening that lets you see and grab everything, without rummaging.

✅ SUSTAINABILITY - Our mission is to focus on creating products for a SUSTAINABLE future. The belt bag's fabric is made from recycled nylon, the lining is made from recycled polyester – a durable, versatile material that turns recycled bottles into bags.
body.description: Everywhere fanny pack is a must-have accessory for every adult, it's not only practical, but also the perfect complement to your outfit. When you are tired of fancy fanny packs and just looking for a high-end, practical and fashionable nylon fanny pack, then on this page, you have found it. We are professional fanny pack designer and manufacturer, this fanny pack is our latest product, you can enjoy the same service as a luxury brand at the most affordable price. Why choose it? 💝 high end accessories Every material and accessory of this belt bag comes from high-end factories: Fabric: RPET Nylon, waterproof, wear-resistant and comfortable; Zipper: Customized high-grade gun color zipper, smooth and strong; Buckle: Firm, easy to open and close, not easy to deform; High end materials, coupled with precision workmanship in our professional factory, make this fanny pack a quality no less than a luxury item. 💝 Reasonable compartment This sleek belt bag ditches the clutter and adds just 3 mesh wall pockets on the inside for a space that's flexible and functional. The main pocket of the fanny pack is used to store sunglasses, earplugs, lipstick; Wall pockets are used to hold cell phones, cards, cash. A fanny pack allows you to keep your belongings organized when outdoors and provides a secure binding for special small items. 💝 Great Outdoor Accessory A fashionable fanny pack for women is the best accessory for every man or woman, it can be used all day long. This fanny pack can work when you walk, ride, hike, travel, shop. 💝 100% Satisfaction Guarantee We are confident in the quality of this fashionable women fanny pack and would like to give it a 100% satisfaction guarantee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect man purse for me
reviews.reviewText: Since I wear reading glasses, it is such a pain to keep them handy with you all the time. This allows me to carry my stuff very comfortably around my waste without being as bulky as fanny packs. I also like to wear sweats and gym shorts that are easily dragged down by a phone and wallet. This is a great fix. Fits my 40" waist with a couple inches to spare. Very light and comfortable. Holds my wallet, Pixel 6 phone, keys, earbuds, glasses, ink pen, with a little room to spare (about 70% full). This is ideal for me. It is made surprisingly well for the money. Well built, very nice and smooth zippers. The strap is very comfortable too against the body. Not rough or rigid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 5 stars all around!
reviews.reviewText: This bag is fantastic. It is sturdy, waterproof, spacious, and it looks super cute. I recently went on a trip abroad and this bag was perfect for traveling. I always felt like my belongings were safe. I got caught in the rain and the bag dried off quickly. I love it so much I got one for my friend in another color and another one for myself!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Daughter loves it
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my 12 year old daughter. She and her friends all see the big girls wearing and had to have them. I chose to do this as a starter bag before dropping $$ on another brand. I was nervous as I know she wanted that other brand. She opened and after all the other gift immediately starting sticking the bag with her gift cards and other products. She loves it. The bag has lots of space and organizing pockets. Great quality and she has no issues wearing despite it not having that brand logo on it. All is all great buy came fast and looks great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The bag is cute and very functional. It's a very good value. Holds up well and interior has functional pockets for credit cards and money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and convenient!
reviews.reviewText: Just brought this on a recent flight. I really liked having those few essentials right there on my chest. I used it as an arm sling while I was sleeping. I think the strap could be a little bit longer, but it fit me just right. If you have a larger torso/breasts, it might be a little bit snug. I also would like to see different interior color options, but the outside material feels durable and so far the pockets inside have held up! I also really liked the back zipper for my credit cards and passes, and I didn’t have to worry about them falling out while I was getting Chapstick or my phone out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lovely belt bag
reviews.reviewText: I had my eye on a belt bag for a while. I chose this one due to the good reviews. It is a great belt bag. Just big enough but not too big. I may exchange for a different color though. The blush/pink is just a bit too much for me. It has good compartments. Occasionally the zipper is a little harder to pull. Like I feel like I need to be careful with it but it seems quality enough. Would recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Glad I bought this!
reviews.reviewText: I got this on sale and thought if it doesn’t work out, at least it was cheap. Well, when it arrived, I was pleasantly surprised at the quality! It’s a good size for holding my essentials when I’m out doing something active and need my hands free. Cute little somewhat-dupe for the Lulu waist bag!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than Expected
reviews.reviewText: This bag is really cool. It looks fashionable, it’s well made and worth every dollar. I’m glad I chose to purchase this one instead of the name brand one. Now I can buy an additional colors, that would even out to the price of the more expensive brand name bag.I’ve received several compliments on how stylish I looked wearing it. Who knew???
Muy bonita, de buen material y la correa queda perfecta ni tan grande ni chica y aparte se ajusta
Súper práctica, buena calidad y de buena calidad.
